mapper.select: select count (*) from review where userno=#{userno}

select b.* FROM (SELECT row_number() over(ORDER BY a.rno desc) num, a.* FROM (SELECT r.rno, r.RCONTENT, r.REGDATE, r.RSTAR, i.ITITLE, i.IDEALTYPE, u.NICKNAME FROM REVIEW r, USERS u, INDIVIDUAL i WHERE u.USERNO = r.USERNO AND r.INO = i.INO AND i.USERNO = #{userno} UNION SELECT r.rno, r.RCONTENT, r.REGDATE, r.RSTAR, s.STITLE, s.SDEALTYPE, u.NICKNAME FROM REVIEW r, USERS u, SHARING s WHERE u.USERNO = r.USERNO AND r.SNO = s.SNO AND s.USERNO = #{userno}) a ORDER BY regdate DESC) b WHERE num BETWEEN #{row} AND #{row}+9
